title: Save or update the status of a listing using a listing ID and offer ID
description: Saves a status to a listing in the authenticated user's Sold Items list.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing to modify.

path.name: offerId
path.description: The ID of the fixed price offer, or 0 if none.

path.name: stat
path.description: The status you want to save, should be one of the following: EmailSent, PaymentReceived, GoodsShipped, SaleCompleted.

returns.description: <StatusResponse> Details of whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
